item.title: Clang Static Analyzer (scan-build) Setup
item.description:
What is scan-build?
Clang Static Analyzer (also known as scan-build) is a source code analysis tool that finds bugs in C, C++, and Objective-C programs. The analyzer is a 100% open source ...
